.. image:: nectar.png
   :scale: 40%
   :align: right

Router
======

The last bit of hardware needed for this project is a router to
connect directly to the EK-TM4C1294XL.

----

.. image:: router.jpeg

This ends the hardware introduction for the tutorial. Now to
introduce the software dependencies.

----
